# Astrocyte

```{r}
ctype_idx <- 1

gse <- gse_data[[ctype_idx]]
deg <- deg_data[[ctype_idx]]
gse
deg

gse_corrected <- removeBatchEffect(
  logcounts(gse), batch = gse$batch, group = gse$genotype
)
deg_corrected <- removeBatchEffect(
  logcounts(deg), batch = deg$batch, group = deg$genotype
)

gse_range <- c(
  min(gse_corrected),
  (min(gse_corrected) + max(gse_corrected)) / 2,
  max(gse_corrected)
)
deg_range <- c(
  min(deg_corrected),
  (min(deg_corrected) + max(deg_corrected)) / 2,
  max(deg_corrected)
)
```

### DE Gene Sets

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
deg_results_up <- results_up

)

  FUN = function(x, results) x[match(rownames(results), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  gse_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

  FUN = function(sublist, filter_vec) {

  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

  gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[which.max(lengths(x))]
)

match_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_genes_up,

)
deg_results_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) {

  },
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)

  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),

)
```

```{r}
deg_results_up <- results_up

  gse_results_up,
  FUN = function(x) geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
)

  FUN = function(x, results) x[match(rownames(results), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  gse_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(sublist, filter_vec) {
    lapply(sublist, FUN = function(vec) vec[vec %in% rownames(filter_vec)])
  },
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[which.max(lengths(x))]
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[lengths(x) > 0])
match_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_genes_up,

)
deg_results_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) {

)
```

```{r}
deg_results_up <- results_up
deg_results_down <- results_down

gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_results_up,
  FUN = function(x) {
    unlist(
      geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
    )
  }
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[x %in% rownames(ref)],
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) table(x))
deg_results_sub_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[rownames(x) %in% names(ref), ],
  deg_results_up,
  gse_genes_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[match(rownames(ref), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_sub_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[which.max(x)])
deg_results_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[rownames(x) %in% names(ref), ],
  deg_results_up,
  gse_genes_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_results_up,
  FUN = function(x) geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, results) x[match(rownames(results), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  gse_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(sublist, filter_vec) {
    lapply(
      sublist,
      FUN = function(vec) vec[vec %in% rownames(filter_vec)]
    )
  },
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[lengths(x) > 0])

gse_genes_down <- lapply(
  gse_results_down,
  FUN = function(x) {
    unlist(
      geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
    )
  }
)
gse_genes_down <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[x %in% rownames(ref)],
  gse_genes_down,
  deg_results_down,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

  gse_genes_down,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_down <- mapply(

  deg_results_sub_down,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

deg_results_down <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[rownames(x) %in% names(ref), ],
  deg_results_down,
  gse_genes_down,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

)
```

```{r}
  S305N_MAPTKI =

    gse.genotypeP301S -

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r, fig.width = 11, fig.height = 10}
)
```

```{r}
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

  FUN = function(sublist, filter_vec) {

  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

  gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[which.max(lengths(x))]
)

)
deg_results_up <- mapply(
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
```

## Hub Analysis

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)

  levels = design
)

fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)

  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
deg_results_up <- results_up
deg_results_down <- results_down

gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_results_up,
  FUN = function(x) geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, results) x[match(rownames(results), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  gse_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(sublist, filter_vec) {
    lapply(sublist, FUN = function(vec) vec[vec %in% rownames(filter_vec)])
  },
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[which.max(lengths(x))]
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[lengths(x) > 0])
match_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_genes_up,
  FUN = function(x) geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(x)])
)
deg_results_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) {
    x[rownames(x) %in% unlist(ref), ]
  },
  deg_results_up,
  match_genes_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)

gse_genes_down <- lapply(
  gse_results_down,
  FUN = function(x) geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
)

  FUN = function(x, results) x[match(rownames(results), names(x))],

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)

  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,

    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)
```

## Hub Analysis

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)
plotSA(fit)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + deg$genotype + deg$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeS305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeP301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    deg.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    deg.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(deg), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")

  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),

)
```

```{r}
design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + gse$genotype + gse$batch)
colnames(design) <- make.names(colnames(design))
cont_mat <- makeContrasts(
  S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeS305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeP301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_MAPTKI_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_MAPTKI -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_S305N_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_S305N -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  NLGF_P301S_MAPTKI =
    gse.genotypeNLGF_P301S -
    gse.genotypeMAPTKI,
  levels = design
)

fit <- lmFit(logcounts(gse), design)
fit <- contrasts.fit(fit, cont_mat)
fit <- eBayes(fit, trend = TRUE, robust = TRUE)

tests <- decideTests(fit, method = "global")
write.fit(
  fit, tests, file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"),
  adjust = "BH", F.adjust = "BH", method = "global"
)
```

```{r}
deg_results_up <- results_up
deg_results_down <- results_down

gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_results_up,
  FUN = function(x) {
    unlist(
      geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
    )
  }
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[x %in% rownames(ref)],
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) table(x))
deg_results_sub_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[rownames(x) %in% names(ref), ],
  deg_results_up,
  gse_genes_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[match(rownames(ref), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_sub_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[which.max(x)])
deg_results_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, ref) x[rownames(x) %in% names(ref), ],
  deg_results_up,
  gse_genes_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(
  gse_results_up,
  FUN = function(x) geneIds(gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% rownames(x)])
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(x, results) x[match(rownames(results), names(x))],
  gse_genes_up,
  gse_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- mapply(
  FUN = function(sublist, filter_vec) {
    lapply(
      sublist,
      FUN = function(vec) vec[vec %in% rownames(filter_vec)]
    )
  },
  gse_genes_up,
  deg_results_up,
  SIMPLIFY = FALSE
)
gse_genes_up <- lapply(gse_genes_up, FUN = function(x) x[lengths(x) > 0])

gse_genes_down <- lapply(
  gse_results_down,
  FUN = function(x) {
    unlist(

    )
  }
)
```
